entry.summary:
Author: Twilight789

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,673Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 42

entry.title: Marriage of Convenience
entry.summary:
Author: after_avenging_hours

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,173Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 56

Summary: Jason Todd doesn't marry for love. That whole 'white-picket-fence' life was never in the cards for him. But he will marry you, so you can have access to his health insurance. He's certainly not using it, and he'd rather not have to deal with looking for a new roommate after you die from the infection you refuse to get treatment for. It's a marriage of convenience. No fuss. No complications... at least, until he starts falling in love with his wife.

entry.title: Strawberry Waffles
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,107Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 414

Summary: “Like a date?” You ask in a near whisper. Jason looks like he's been electrocuted but slowly he nods his head twice. “Yeah. A date. You and me, the school dance.” Oh. Your heart feels like it's beating so fast it's going to stop at any second. But you nod, your face warm, and there's no way you can stop yourself from smiling now. “Um, y- yeah.” You stammer before clearing your throat softly. “Yes.” You say, more confident in your answer. “Yes, I would.. love to go with you. On a date. To the dance.” Or Jason Todd becomes a girl dad after dying and coming back to life

entry.title: Outsiders Inspired Batboys: Jason Todd x Chubby! Reader x Tim Drake
entry.summary:
Author: River_Shayde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,401Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Ever wonder what would happen if Dick had to raise Jason, Tim, and Damian during the 1960s in Gotham? What if they all met a once privileged girl who lost everything and now has to acclimate life in the greaser side of town? How will they all interact and face the villains, socs, and family issues that make up their daily life?Reader turns 18 a few days after meeting the family, and this will mainly be a Jason and Tim love story. I might do two ending depending on how I feel and the direction that the story goes. Protective vibes will be in play.Setting inspired by Grease and the Outsiders.

entry.title: The Bloom Knot
entry.summary:
Author: nocteris

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,745Chapters: 2/15Kudos: 25

Summary: It was cold, then suddenly it wasn’t. From where your hands touched, a sudden warmth travelled up from your hand, to your arm, to your core. A flash of light glowed beneath the translucent shine of the near empty orange juice pitcher. Everyone around you fell silent. The pitcher fell, landing with a dull thwack against the table, only to be caught by Alfred who was, for a lack of a better word, speechless. You had just soul bonded with (arguably) the hottest guy you’ve ever met. But why, on God’s earth, did it have to be your best friend’s older brother? — Soulmates AU, College Student! reader x Professor! Jason Todd

entry.title: we're all reaching out to find another hand
entry.summary:
Author: soter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,422Chapters: 6/18Kudos: 88

Summary: “I know you’re a meta,” you blurt. Jason stares. “What.” “I saw your hand—I saw the cut and the blood, but then, it was healed, somehow, right, and like, I know I wasn’t supposed to see that and then I felt really bad about it and I wanted to let you know that I know but I didn’t want you to think I was going to, like, blackmail you—” “Blackmail me?” “Of course not,” you quickly say. “Never. No. That’s horrible. Can you imagine what would happen if it got out?” You wince. “Sorry, stupid question, you probably have.”or in which you discover that your neighbor, Jason Todd, is a metahuman, try to compensate, and things get a little... weird.

entry.title: The Knight and the Betrothed
entry.summary:
Author: anastasia1513

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,069Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 17

Summary: You’ve always known you would one day leave the Kingdom of Gotham. It was decided long before you could walk—when you were but a swaddled infant in Queen Martha’s arms, and a solemn promise was inked in royal blood between two thrones. You were to be wed to Prince Jason of Blüdhaven, the second-born son of King Thomas’s oldest ally. The pact sealed peace between the two lands, a unity your parents celebrated every year with music and light. But that was long ago. Prince Jason died young.
